name: assignPhoneNumbersAutoReceptionist
description:
Assign available phone numbers to an [auto receptionist](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360021121312-Managing-Auto-Receptionists-and-Interactive-Voice-Response-IVR-). The available numbers can be retrieved using the List Phone Numbers API with `type` query parameter set to "unassigned". **Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher account plan with Zoom Phone License * Account owner or admin permissions
**Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

autoReceptionistId.description: Unique Identifier of the Auto Receptionist. It can be retrieved from the [List Sites API](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/phone-site/listphonesites).

phone_numbers.description: Provide either the unique identifier of the Phone Number  in the `id` field or provide the phone number in the `number` field.

id.description: Unique Identifier of the Phone number.
